詹娜·奥尔特加 Jenna Ortega

trans_title: 未定名J·J·艾布拉姆斯时间旅行电影
未定名J·J·艾布拉姆斯《回到未来》致敬影片
introduction: Producer and director J.J. Abrams has become Hollywood’s go-to for nostalgia trips, and now he’s planning another one. This time he’s doing his own take on Back to the Future.We’ve learned from our sources that Abrams is working on an as-of-yet untitled movie which, while it won’t exactly be a remake of Back to the Future, will be something of an homage.Details are sparse, and Abrams is remaining tight-lipped about it, but we do know that much like Back to the Future this film will be about a young man traveling through time. To
